title: Basics: Earth and stars
summary: My first Three.js project! Learning the fundamentals: scene setup, camera positioning, basic geometry, materials, and simple directional lighting.

title: Interactive Solar System
summary: Built a miniature solar system with orbiting planets. Learned about object hierarchies, parent-child relationships, and different rotation speeds. Added mouse controls for camera interaction.

title: Particle System Galaxy
summary: Created a swirling galaxy using thousands of particles. Explored BufferGeometry, Points material, and mathematical patterns for positioning particles in spiral formations.

title: Terrain Generation with Noise
summary: Generated procedural terrain using Perlin noise. Learned about height maps, vertex manipulation, and creating realistic landscape textures with multiple materials.

title: Physics-Based Bouncing Balls
summary: Integrated Cannon.js physics engine with Three.js. Created realistic bouncing balls with gravity, collision detection, and different material properties affecting bounce behavior.

title: Water Shader with Waves
summary: Dove into custom shaders! Created realistic water surface using vertex and fragment shaders. Learned GLSL basics, wave mathematics, and shader uniforms for animation.

title: 3D Text with Custom Fonts
summary: Created extruded 3D text using TextGeometry. Learned about font loading, geometry extrusion parameters, and applying different materials to front, back, and sides.

title: Volumetric Lighting (God Rays)
summary: Implemented dramatic volumetric lighting effects. Explored post-processing, render targets, and multiple pass rendering to create atmospheric light beams.

title: Morphing Geometric Shapes
summary: Created smooth transitions between different geometric shapes using morphTargets. Learned about vertex animation and keyframe interpolation for organic transformations.

title: Interactive Piano with 3D Keys
summary: Built a playable 3D piano with Web Audio API integration. Combined Three.js visuals with audio synthesis, key press detection, and realistic key animations.

title: Fractal Tree Generation
summary: Generated beautiful fractal trees using recursive algorithms. Explored L-systems, branch generation, and organic growth patterns with procedural leaf placement.

title: VR-Ready Room Experience
summary: Created a WebXR-compatible virtual room. Learned about VR controllers, hand tracking, teleportation, and optimizing scenes for VR performance requirements.

title: Cloth Simulation
summary: Simulated realistic cloth behavior using constraint-based physics. Implemented spring forces, wind effects, and collision detection with other objects in the scene.

title: Procedural City Generator
summary: Built an infinite city generator with procedural buildings, roads, and layout. Learned about instanced rendering for performance and algorithmic urban planning.

title: Ray Marching Fractals
summary: Explored ray marching techniques to render complex fractals like Mandelbulbs. Dove deep into distance functions, lighting calculations, and shader optimization.

title: Multiplayer Chess Game
summary: Created a 3D chess game with WebSocket multiplayer support. Implemented game logic, piece movement validation, and real-time synchronization between players.

title: Realistic Fire Simulation
summary: Simulated realistic fire using particle systems and custom shaders. Learned about heat simulation, particle lifecycle management, and volumetric rendering techniques.

title: Machine Learning Visualization
summary: Visualized neural network training in 3D space. Connected TensorFlow.js with Three.js to show real-time weight changes and data flow through network layers.

title: Ocean Wave Simulation
summary: Created realistic ocean waves using FFT-based height fields. Implemented foam generation, underwater caustics, and dynamic reflection/refraction effects.

title: AR Product Showcase
summary: Built an AR application for product visualization using WebXR. Implemented plane detection, object anchoring, and realistic lighting integration with real environment.

title: Flocking Birds Simulation
summary: Implemented Craig Reynolds' boids algorithm in 3D. Created realistic flocking behavior with separation, alignment, and cohesion rules for hundreds of birds.

title: Holographic Material Effects
summary: Created stunning holographic and iridescent materials using advanced shader techniques. Explored thin-film interference, rainbow effects, and view-dependent coloring.

title: DNA Double Helix Animation
summary: Modeled and animated a DNA double helix structure. Learned about biological visualization, parametric curves, and scientific accuracy in 3D representations.

title: Real-time Weather Visualization
summary: Connected to weather APIs to create dynamic 3D weather representations. Implemented cloud generation, precipitation effects, and atmospheric scattering.

title: Rubik's Cube Solver
summary: Built an interactive 3D Rubik's cube with solving algorithms. Implemented cube mechanics, rotation animations, and automated solving using layer-by-layer method.

title: Crystalline Growth Simulation
summary: Simulated crystal formation using diffusion-limited aggregation. Created beautiful organic growth patterns with customizable parameters and real-time visualization.

title: Space Debris Tracking
summary: Visualized real satellite and space debris data in 3D Earth orbit. Connected to TLE databases and implemented orbital mechanics for accurate positioning.

title: Quantum Field Visualization
summary: Attempted to visualize quantum field fluctuations using probability clouds and wave functions. Explored the intersection of physics and visual representation.

title: Architectural Walkthrough
summary: Created an immersive architectural visualization with realistic materials, lighting, and navigation. Implemented level-of-detail optimization for smooth performance.

title: Interactive Music Visualizer
summary: Built a reactive music visualizer that responds to audio frequency data. Combined Web Audio API with dynamic geometries, particles, and shader effects for an immersive experience.
